entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mascouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
